c74object.name: cs.2click-presets
c74object.description: Manages numbered presets containing routing pairs for cs.2click modules.

objarg.name: filename
objarg.description: Name of a JSON or YAML file to be imported as presets dictionary on load.

method.name: int/float
method.description: Recalls the preset stored at the index number specified by int. Floats are truncated: 0.999 = 0; 1.001 = 1. If no preset is stored at that index, an error message is printed to the Max window.

method.name: bang
method.description: Recalls the preset defined by the last number received.

method.name: store
method.description: Stores a preset containing the current routing state (as contained in the cs.2click-routing-pairs dict) to the index number specified by int. Floats are truncated: 0.999 = 0; 1.001 = 1.

method.name: storagewindow
method.description: Opens a window containing a dict.view of the presets dictionary contents.

method.name: save
method.description: Writes the stored presets to disk as a JSON file (using an export message to the cs.2click-presets dict’s). If the object is not given a filename argument, a default filename of ‘routing-presets.json’ will be used.

method.name: anything
method.description: Incoming messages not conforming to the message types defined above are sent directly to the internal cs.2click-presets dict. This allows direct communication, for example to send standard import or export messages as defined in the dict documentation.

example.caption: A “store n” message sets a preset that can be recalled by “n”

c74object.discussion: This abstraction manages presets for the cs.2click audio routing system in a dict named cs.2click-presets. Each preset consists of a dictionary of routing pairs indicating the connection for each slot in a routing system. Presets are given integer keys.
